pr_title: fix: add support for timestamp in ParseDateStdDeserializer

timeline.bodyText: It seems DateUtils.parseDate can also return null if parsing went wrong, do we need to handle that?

replies.bodyText: I'm adding a few extra error handlers now, will commit soon

timeline.message: fix: check for error in both parseDate and new Date() and return a common error string
test: adds date parsing tests for global (json) ObjectMapper
